attributes.action: remove the stop and swerve part of the practical motorcycle test.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to remove the stop and swerve part of the practical motorcycle test.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=stopswerve


Her Majesty's Government
